So often we find ourselves mired in processes that have long overstayed their welcome. Addressing the calculus of system-level issues whether they are in the workplace or in your community is critical to driving data-driven solutions & innovation. My passion is leveraging the access points and the pain points to streamline processes. 

_Integration_ is where we can begin our journey.
